title: Memory lingers on
creator_credit: Colleen Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Whether its in the eyes of her grandchild or the photos and memories of those loved and lost, Colleen Johnson feels a deep connection to her family. No matter what, they are her heart and soul.
creator_credit_for_label: Colleen Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
